alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 6:44PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN HENRY AND EASTERN HOUSTON COUNTIES IN SOUTHEASTERN ALABAMA...NORTHEASTERN JACKSON COUNTY IN THE PANHANDLE OF FLORIDA...WEST CENTRAL DECATUR...MILLER... CLAY...SOUTHERN RANDOLPH...WESTERN CALHOUN...EARLY AND SEMINOLE COUNTIES IN SOUTHWESTERN GEORGIA THROUGH 730 PM EST/630 PM CST/... At 644 PM EST/544 PM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles east of Fort Gaines to near Marianna. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Colquitt, Fort Gaines, Morgan, Donalsonville, Blakely, Marianna, Edison, Arlington, Columbia, Douglasville, Centerville, Malone, Sneads, Greenwood, Gordon, Iron City, Damascus, Jakin, Bellville, and Bascom. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
